multimedia.name: Multimedia
multimedia.description1: Play songs on demand or listen to a radio station all day without ever having to stop.
multimedia.description2: The party won't stop even when you leave, as Bouns'bot stays in your channel 24/7!

game.name: Games
game.description1: Play a variety of mini-games! You can play over 15 mini-games alone or against your friends.
game.description2: Distinguish yourself with the built-in Bouns'bot ranking and test your general knowledge with our quiz.

logs.name: Logs
logs.description1: What's that? You didn't know Wumpus turned on his camera!
logs.description2: With Bouns'bot, you have access to all the logs available on Discord; simply activate what you need.

ticket.name: Tickets
ticket.description: Bounsâ€™bot allows you to create private support channels, which we call tickets, between your team and those seeking assistance.

engagement.name: Engagement
engagement.description: Reward your members with XP points and keep track of the most active members on your custom leaderboard.

brand.slogan: Create a Discord server that reflects your identity
